EmailTemplate.subject: Ready To Go Back To Work After Your Vacation?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-back-to-work-after-summer-vacation.aspx?cmp=EBBSAUGUSTBLOG19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Get Ready For Back To School Work
Does that back to school feeling kick in every time you return to work after a vacation? Find out 5 tips on how to easily get back into the swing of things at work. Learn More <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-back-to-work-after-summer-vacation.aspx?cmp=EBBSAUGUSTBLOG19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
